# Chapter 2: Microsoft Excel Basics and Data Handling

## Learning Objectives

After studying this chapter you should be able to:

-   Know the basics of Microsoft Excel
-   Import different file types into Microsoft Excel
-   Input and organize data and ranges in an Excel spreadsheet
-   Format your Excel spreadsheet professionally
-   Use different types of formulas, including simple math, conditional, logical, and lookup formulas
-   Combine and create auto-adjusted formulas
